chart.name: invoice-unpaid-chart-per-customer
chart.title: Invoice
chart.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) AS invoice_count, MONTH(self.invoiceDateT) AS month, _party.name AS _party FROM Invoice self LEFT JOIN self.party AS _party WHERE YEAR(self.invoiceDateT) = YEAR(current_date) AND self.invoiceDateT > :fromDateTime AND self.invoiceDateT < :toDateTime AND self.statusSelect <> 'paid' GROUP BY _party, MONTH(self.invoiceDateT) ORDER BY _party

chart.name: invoice-paid-chart-per-category
chart.title: Invoice
chart.dataset: SELECT _product.name as product_name, _category.name as category_name, COUNT(self.invoice) AS invoice_count, MONTH(_invoice.invoiceDateT) AS month FROM InvoiceLine self LEFT JOIN self.product AS _product LEFT JOIN _product.category AS _category LEFT JOIN self.invoice AS _invoice WHERE YEAR(_invoice.invoiceDateT) = YEAR(current_date) AND _invoice.invoiceDateT > :fromDateTime AND _invoice.invoiceDateT < :toDateTime AND _invoice.statusSelect = 'paid' GROUP BY _product, _category, _invoice, MONTH(_invoice.invoiceDateT) ORDER BY _invoice.id

chart.name: party-chart-per-state
chart.title: Customer per State chart
chart.dataset: SELECT state.name as _state, COUNT(a.party.name) as party FROM Address a LEFT JOIN a.state as state GROUP BY state, party

chart.name: invoice-per-status-amount-bar
chart.title: Invoice Amount Chart
chart.dataset: SELECT i.statusSelect AS status, i.netAmount AS amount FROM Invoice i WHERE i.netAmount < :amount

chart.name: invoice-per-status-line-chart
chart.title: Invoice Amount Chart
chart.dataset: SELECT i.statusSelect AS status, COUNT(i.id) AS cnt FROM Invoice i GROUP BY i.statusSelect
